actions.text: Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Energy and Commerce.  Report No: 98-141.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to increase the authorization for fiscal year 1984 for maternal and child health services block grant.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Energy and Commerce with amendment, H. Rept. 98-141) Amends title V (Maternal and Child Health Services Block Grant) of the Social Security Act to increase the authorization of appropriations for FY 1984.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to increase the authorization for fiscal year 1984 for maternal and child health services block grant.
